channel.title: Cycling on Trisha Gee
channel.description: Recent content in Cycling on Trisha Gee

item.title: Cyclist tribes
item.description: Living and working in central London, you quickly learn that the fastest way around town is to cycle. My extensive research into this activity has shown there are a number of different cycling tribes. Of course, I have split them into the two groups that are most appropriate to me: 1) slower than me and 2) faster than me. You can probably tell what sort of a cyclist I am by my attitude to the two groups.
